overview: A wealthy London nobleman hires a pretty but poor young girl to distract his playboy son from marrying a golddigger. Complications ensue when the girl and the father begin to fall for each other, and things get even more complicated when the son declares his love for her, too.
tagline: AND IN A DAY OF BURSTING DRAMA, SHE MADE AN AMAZING DECISION...THE STRANGEST OF ALL LOVE TRIANGLES!
title: The Lady Refuses
